name: Dezgo
description: 🪄 Provides easy&fast access to text2image / image2image / inpainting AI. (57 models across Stable Diffusion 1.x/2.x and finetuned models)

api_methods.name: /text2image
api_methods.description:
Generate an image from a text description
The result is returned as "image/png".

The following parameters influence the request cost: `width`, `height`, `steps`, `upscale`
(see the "About" section for more details)

License: CreativeML Open RAIL-M (https://dezgo.com/license.txt)


**Global Constraints:**
- Auto resolution: if not provided, fields `width` and `height` are automatically set to the model's native resolution.

parameters.name: prompt
parameters.description:
Describe how the final image should look like

**Constraints:**
- Text length: `0 - 1000` characters
parameters.default: an astronaut riding a horse, digital art, epic lighting, highly-detailed masterpiece trending HQ

parameters.name: seed
parameters.description:
Unique image seed number. If not provided, the image will be random.
An unsigned 32-bit integer seed used to control the generator randomness.
Reusing the same seed with the same parameters will produce the same image.
Reusing the same seed with slightly different parameters tends to produce variations of the same composition ;
you can use this to experiment with the impact of different parameters.

If you instructed the API to choose a random seed, it can be retrieved from the response header `x-input-seed`

**Constraints:**
- Range: `0 - 4294967295`

parameters.name: guidance
parameters.description:
Adjusts how much the AI tries to fit the prompt (higher = stricter, lower = more freedom).
Higher values means that the AI will try harder to match the text, but extreme values may produce more artifacts.
Lower values means that the AI is allowed more creative freedom in the interpretation of the text.

**Constraints:**
- Range: `-20 - 20`

parameters.name: steps
parameters.description:
Number of sampling steps. More steps = more details but also longer computation time.
More steps may improve quality under some circumstances and refine details, but it will take longer and be more expensive.
Fewer will result in lower quality images but is quicker and cheaper to process.

**Constraints:**
- Range: `10 - 150`

parameters.name: sampler
parameters.description:
Defines the sampling method used to generate the image.
The best samplers for low step counts tend to be `dpm`, `euler` and `euler_a`.

**Constraints:**
- Enum:
  - `ddim`
  - `dpm`
  - `euler`
  - `euler_a`
  - `k_lms`
  - `pndm`

parameters.name: width
parameters.description:
The image width in pixels.
Must be divisible by 8 (auto-adjusted to the lowest multiple)

**Constraints:**
- Range: `320 - 1024`

parameters.name: upscale
parameters.description:
Upscale the image by this factor using the Real-ESRGAN model. Currently only a factor of 2 is supported.

**Constraints:**
- Range: `1 - 2`

parameters.name: negative_prompt
parameters.description:
Describe what you DON'T want in the generated image

**Constraints:**
- Text length: `0 - 1000` characters
parameters.default: ugly, tiling, poorly drawn hands, poorly drawn feet, poorly drawn face, out of frame, extra limbs, disfigured, deformed, body out of frame, blurry, bad anatomy, blurred, watermark, grainy, signature, cut off, draft

parameters.name: height
parameters.description:
The image height in pixels.
Must be divisible by 8 (auto-adjusted to the lowest multiple)

**Constraints:**
- Range: `320 - 1024`

parameters.name: model
parameters.description:
The AI used to generate the image.

**Constraints:**
- Enum:
  - `abyss_orange_mix_2`
  - `analog_diffusion`
  - `anything_3_0`
  - `anything_4_0`
  - `basil_mix`
  - `blood_orange_mix`
  - `deliberate`
  - `dh_classicanime`
  - `disco_diffusion_style`
  - `double_exposure_diffusion`
  - `dreamshaper`
  - `duchaiten_anime`
  - `duchaiten_darkside`
  - `duchaiten_dreamworld`
  - `eimis_anime_diffusion_1`
  - `ely_orange_mix`
  - `emoji_diffusion`
  - `epic_diffusion_1`
  - `epic_diffusion_1_1`
  - `foto_assisted_diffusion`
  - `future_diffusion`
  - `hasdx`
  - `iconsmi_appiconsmodelforsd`
  - `inkpunk_diffusion`
  - `lowpoly_world`
  - `openjourney`
  - `openjourney_2`
  - `openniji`
  - `paint_journey_2_768px`
  - `papercut`
  - `pastel_mix`
  - `portrait_plus`
  - `realistic_vision_1_3`
  - `redshift_diffusion`
  - `redshift_diffusion_768px`
  - `something_2`
  - `stable_diffusion_fluidart`
  - `stable_diffusion_papercut`
  - `stable_diffusion_voxelart`
  - `stablediffusion_1_4`
  - `stablediffusion_1_5`
  - `stablediffusion_2_0_512px`
  - `stablediffusion_2_0_768px`
  - `stablediffusion_2_1_512px`
  - `stablediffusion_2_1_768px`
  - `steampunk_diffusion`
  - `synthwavepunk_v2`
  - `texture_diffusion`
  - `trinart_2_0`
  - `tshirt_diffusion`
  - `vectorartz_diffusion`
  - `vintedois_diffusion_v0_1`
  - `vox_2`
  - `waifudiffusion_1_3`
  - `waifudiffusion_1_4`

utterances.utterance: Can you create an image of a futuristic cityscape with flying cars and neon lights, using the euler_a sampler?

parameters.prompt: futuristic cityscape with flying cars and neon lights

utterances.utterance: I need a high-quality portrait of a medieval knight in full armor, with a detailed background of a castle. Make sure the image is 1024x768 pixels.

parameters.prompt: medieval knight in full armor with a detailed background of a castle

utterances.utterance: Generate a serene landscape of a mountain lake at sunrise, with the water reflecting the sky. Use the deliberate model and set the guidance to 10.

parameters.prompt: serene landscape of a mountain lake at sunrise with the water reflecting the sky

utterances.utterance: Could you make an image of a cyberpunk street market with vibrant colors and intricate details? Set the steps to 50 for more refinement.

parameters.prompt: cyberpunk street market with vibrant colors and intricate details

utterances.utterance: I want an image of a fantasy forest with glowing mushrooms and magical creatures. Use the anything_4_0 model and upscale it by a factor of 2.

parameters.prompt: fantasy forest with glowing mushrooms and magical creatures

utterances.utterance: Create a picture of a steampunk airship flying over a desert, with gears and cogs visible on the ship. Set the seed to 123456 for consistency.

parameters.prompt: steampunk airship flying over a desert with gears and cogs visible on the ship

utterances.utterance: Can you generate an image of a futuristic robot with a sleek design, standing in a high-tech lab? Use the dpm sampler and set the width to 800 pixels.

parameters.prompt: futuristic robot with a sleek design standing in a high-tech lab

utterances.utterance: I need an image of a tropical beach with palm trees and crystal-clear water. Make sure the image is 1280x720 pixels and use the realistic_vision_1_3 model.

parameters.prompt: tropical beach with palm trees and crystal-clear water

utterances.utterance: Generate a picture of a vintage car driving through a rainy city at night, with reflections on the wet streets. Set the guidance to 5 for a balanced result.

parameters.prompt: vintage car driving through a rainy city at night with reflections on the wet streets

utterances.utterance: Can you create an image of a magical library with floating books and glowing runes? Use the dreamshaper model and set the steps to 40 for more detail.

parameters.prompt: magical library with floating books and glowing runes
